item.title: CBAY
item.description: score:96 Chances: Gilead Sciences, Inc. has completed the acquisition of CymaBay Therapeutics, Inc. for $4.3 billion in total equity value, adding to its liver portfolio and aligning with its commitment to liver health. CymaBayâ€™s lead product candidate, seladelpar, for the treatment of primary biliary cholangitis (PBC) including pruritus, has shown promising results in clinical trials.
